[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1564516236327{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1573231702704{margin-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;}”]

Marketing Automation: Driving Growth & Producing Measurable Results

[vc_custom_heading text=”Nearly 90 agencies share how and why they are using marketing automation.” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1573231623051{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1588269772470{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]SharpSpring and Ascend2 are continuing to bring you the latest in agency insights, actions and tactics. We polled nearly 90 agencies about marketing automation to gain insight into how, when and why they are using marketing automation.

This quick-reference infographic is packed with easily digestible data on how agencies are developing and implementing their marketing automation strategies.

Download the infographic to find out:[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron sm-hide”]

  • Key objectives for marketing automation
  • How agencies are using marketing automation to achieve goals – for themselves and their clients
  • Challenges agencies are facing with marketing automation
  • How agencies use marketing automation to document and track ROI for key metrics
  • How quickly agencies are seeing results
  • And much more!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text]
